statement.p: What is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent is the number in parentheses (1.0995). The increase is the amount more than 100. In this case that is \displaystyle{1.0995}-{1}={0.0995}. Converted to percent notation this is \displaystyle{100}{\left({0.0995}\right)}={9.95}\%.
